name: Research Under Water
description:
Research Under Water 🐶

Little dog going on a underwater adventure, to take picture for her research.

Touch the screen when the capsule is in line with the creature to have a good shot, get as many photo as you can ! Don't turn off the vehicule too late or too soon or you will miss it !

Made this game in 4 hours with my sister FranceskaLaSalsa (who did the art), it was a lot of fun !

Credit : Space Dance by Slaleky and sounds from the Sci-Fi SFX pack from Chris Logsdon and freesound
